module.name: CallerID Managment
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php The CallerID Management module is a unique way to modify the caller ID that is outpulsed on the fly. By dialing a simple feature code you can change the Caller ID for the next call on your extension. Optionally you can also specify the Persistent field, If this is checked the CID is permanently changed for all future calls for your extension until another feature code is entered to change it
module.changelog: *2.11.0.7* Sales cleanup *2.11.0.3* Add option to use '*' for callerid to dynamically input number *2.11.0.2* Packaging of ver 2.11.0.2 *2.11.0.1* Don't override recording settings when changing callerid *2.11.0.0* Bump for 2.11 *2.10.0.18* Packaging of ver 2.10.0.18 *2.10.0.17* Packaging of ver 2.10.0.17
